name: BRAINSTools
tagline: A suite of tools for medical image processing focused on brain analysis
body:
# Developers #

To get started, run: 

    ./Utilities/SetupForDevelopment.sh
***


Example session for a clean build:

    mkdir ~/src/mytester
    cd ~/src/mytester
    git clone git://github.com/BRAINSia/BRAINSTools.git
    cd BRAINSTools/
    bash ./Utilities/SetupForDevelopment.sh
    mkdir -p ../BRAINSTools-build
    cd ../BRAINSTools-build/

    CC=/usr/bin/gcc-4.2 /
    CXX=/usr/bin/g++-4.2 /
    ccmake ../BRAINSTools /
    -DUSE_BRAINSFit:BOOL=ON /
    -DUSE_BRAINSConstellationDetector:BOOL=ON /
    -DUSE_BRAINSABC:BOOL=ON

    make -j24 -k

*NOTE:  The fetching of data still has problems with parallel builds, so we need to restart it a few times*

    make
    make
    make
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
